alert.note: Alert for Siskiyou (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Evacuation Immediate issued September 11 at 1:12PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...Evacuation Immediate... The following message is transmitted at the request of Siskiyou OES. ...Due to fire activity on the Mountain Fire... Zone 2218-B has been split. An Evacuation Order has been issued for Zone 2218-B. Anyone in this area should immediately evacuate. Additionally... An Evacuation Warning has been issued for Zones 2218-A and 2218-C. There is significant danger within this area and residents should either voluntarily evacuate or if choosing to remain... to be ready to evacuate at a moments notice. Visit community.zonehaven.com for current evacuation zone statuses...
